channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.18 (Build 20260107.2)
item.description:
What's New

Add VNI number key logging for better debugging

  • Add character display to handleMarkKey log (keys 1-5 for tone marks)
  • Add character display to handleVowelKey log (keys 6-8 for circumflex/horn)
  • Now VNI input shows pressed number keys like: keyCode=20 '3' instead of just keyCode=20
  • Bump version to 20260107.2

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
